Name: Museums_Rank
Info: Rankings based on number, type, and quality of museums

Name: Sports_Rank
Info: Ranked by a variety of factors related to sporting events and professional franchises.

Name: Annual_Income_Rank
Info: Rankings based on median annual earnings.

Name: Rent_Income_Ratio_Rank
Info: Rankings based on the ratio of monthly rent to monthly income.

Name: Price_of_Weed_Rank
Info: Rankings based on dollars per ounce of marijuana.

Name: Farmers_Markets_Rank
Info: Rankings based on farmer's markets per 100,000 people.

Name: Pet_Friendly_Rank
Info: Rankings based on landlord tolerance, pet fees, and concentration of pet services and stores.

Name: LGBTQ_Friendly_Rank
Info: Rankings based on 16 different factors related to LGBTQ lifestyle.

Name: Food_Rank
Info: Rankings based on the cities' finest restaurants, signature dishes, traditional cuisine, and strength of the dining culture.

Name: Music_Rank
Info: Rankings based on reader input of best/favorite music scenes in the US.

Name: Safety_Rank
Info: Rankings based on violent crime, workplace fatality rates, traffic death rates, and natural disaster risk.

Name: Shopping_Rank
Info: Rankings based on number of retail locations, shopping centers, and sales tax.

Name: Fitness_Rank
Info: Rankings based on a set of 24 metrics from budget and local participation to number of sports facilities and quality of outdoor environment.

Name: Parks_Rank
Info: Rankings based on accessibility, acreage, facilities, and investment in parks and greenspace.

Name: Transit_Rank
Info: Rankings based on "usefulness" of transit routes based on frequency, type of route, and distance to nearest stop on the route.

Name: Bike_Rank
Info: Rankings based on bike infrastructure, hills, road connectivity, and number of bike commuters.

Name: Walk_Rank
Info: Rankings based on pedestrian friendliness and distance to amenities in cities.

Name: Bars_Rank
Info: Rankings based on umber of bars per 10,000 workers.
